dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Kaff... Koff...
Hemoptysis. An optimistic sign.
Even with the repeated training with Qliphoth deterrence, abuse of E.G.O will still push the user's body to the limit.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Will you return the Golden Bough now, Dongbaek?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I was supposed to hand it over to my guests over here, signed in some complicated contract with several stamps... So I can't go back on my words here.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Proudly... boasting your... ignorance... still...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: And you are weak. Still.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Even with the E.G.O from Lobotomy Corp, this was below my expectations, Dongbaek.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Besides... I haven't even introduced you to the technology I developed. I know, why don't we hold our first conference in a while?

dataList.title: K Corp.
dataList.content: The daily audiovisual feed has been sent.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So, tell me, Dongbaek...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: How bigger can your despair grow?

dataList.title: Nest K
dataList.content: Ahhhhh!! Help me!!!
What's up with this sound?
Is that the footage those drones filmed while we were fighting the Abnormality on the street...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I read the threat you sent, Dongbaek. Said you'll release an Abnormality on the streets if I don't speak about the Singularity.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I know you were always fond of radical events... But I didn't think you'd actually do it.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Of course... It produced a lot more tears. All thanks to you.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: No... I wasn't planning to release it. It escaped. You ignored my warning...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: If I responded there, that'd mean admitting that our lab had been experimenting on Abnormalities arbitrarily.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Thank goodness our contractors happened to be near the Nest when it happened.
So it was all part of your plan to have us run into the breached Abnormality?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It was closer to an experiment than a plan. The possibility of failure was kept in mind, but I had evidence to trust that you'd make it through.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I've been keeping an eye on your for longer than you might think.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I told you, didn't it?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I'm a fan of yours.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: No, Sinclair! It's always been the other way around... I am the one who grips...!
How is this... I don't think I want to watch...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: We generated record tears that time as well. It played a significant part in securing the award, I might add.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: The employees of a certain department in N Corp. weren't the best people to talk with, but I was able to procure fresh audiovisual feed thanks to them.
That means... the reason N Corp. could get away with such cruelties in a residential area in Nest K was...
This is what the deal entailed.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I think I remember a certain fellow saying this: while Brother Young-ji's 'glass window' was innovative, it was simply too vast to freely wield, especially for a coarse man like me.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, Dongbaek. Was it you?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: What is... Are you...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: There just were never enough tears.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I mean, look around you, and see how many people are suffering here.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: So they'll be doing the crying for us.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: With no time to shut their eyes.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: I only made minor modifications to Brother Young-ji's work.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: I wanted to show a reflection of any possibility in its unvarnished image.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: That is why I am considering the name for it:

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: 'Mirror'.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: I wish that this will serve as a tool of entertainment... giving us more joy.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Is this why I haven't been able to see you lately? To discover this?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Dongrang, why are you laughing like that?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: It's just funny that you're talking so ferociously when your eyes are full of curious twinkles.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Yi Sang, will you tell him to shut it?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Why don't you hide your astonishment of a child who's tried ice cream for the first time on your face first?
Mouths unable to hold laughter.
Exclamations of amazeness.
Smiles at each other.
Eyes glowing brighter than stars.
Everyone there felt... pure joy.
I only wished that all this...
Would remain a simple recreation.
Be quiet.
You will simply... live on as you are. As if you know nothing.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: The glass window... wasn't made for this kind of wicked degeneracy...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: We're having an important moment. Please mind your language.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: And I know what you're saying. Brother Young-ji would have scolded me for this.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, but did you know, though? We're no longer in the time when we used to cheer over toy-like inventions. The applause won't be as loud with how few of us that remain now.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You're just struggling to let go. Isn't that right?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You give your grand speeches about the evil of technology... But that's no more than a pretext you made up on the way as a means to garner support. To reach your true goal.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You claim to fight the vile technology, but you yourself are being plenty vile.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: When your group took over the Lobotomy branch facility where I just happened to be conducting my research...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You probably told your followers that it was to investigate the Singularity, but in reality, you figured out that you could find pieces of technology you could use as weapons, didn't you? Like E.G.O.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I wonder who gave you all that precious information. Shrenne couldn't have known that. How about a game of twenty questions, will you tell me that way?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Don't talk like you know everything. That attitude of yours...always annoyed me...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Haha, then let me act like I know about just one more thing.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: When we peeked through Brother Young-ji's glass window... and when we got a glimpse of worlds reflected in Yi Sang's mirror...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: We felt the euphoria and schism we would never be able to recover from.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Since the moment the glass window was made...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: All sorts of interest groups came knocking on the door.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Right... While we may think... that we left the League of our own volition...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: We all know what actually happened... We were actually just torn apart and scattered away...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: And that the reason for it came from the inside...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Dongbaek, even if you put my work in the concept incinerator, we won't be able to go back to those innocent times. You know that, right?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Hmm... Even though you are aware... you still can't give up your obsession...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, now I get it.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: If someone were to discover the incinerated technologies again...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Other nameless fellows with other dreams... would feel the same euphoria we once felt. That's what you wanted to happen.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Since we can't return to the past ourselves...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You were going to recreate the past for coming generations.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Wow, what a cute and unique idea, Dongbaek.
M-Miss Dongbaek... Your body...
Dongbaek muttered into emptiness. It was as though she was talking to someone.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Yes... I'll bury it... deep in the sand... hide them...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: For someone to find... some day...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: We... didn't discover the technologies because we were better or had exclusive rights to...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: You may be right, I fooled everyone including myself into working for my own goals... It was... the land we tilled... that was fertile...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That's disheartening to hear. Are you going to discredit all our efforts that went into plowing the soil, missing out on sights of flowers?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Back then, we were naive amateurs, and the past you refuse to forget is just a fleeting moment seen through rose-tinted glasses.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Did your colleagues who gave their lives to the cause know this, though?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That the cause you exclaimed was only a specious banner to lure people with. That it was as vain as a cloud on the sky.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: No... And yet... I'm finally seeing myself better now. Which is why I should plant the sprout and cover it with dirt with my own hands, isn't that right?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: The bud has fallen... and our fruit has long since withered...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: It must be covered with dirt again... let other fruits be borne...
Hey... Is it really okay to let her be?
You know... Your mind doesn't work right when you're using E.G.O...
Now hold on... Are you doing this on purpose...? Taunt her as much as you can...
And wait for her to tire herself out...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...Back to the innocent times, now without us.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Ah, innocence...

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: No words are as embarrassing as that.
Oi, keep it together!

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: No one can shake your mind like I do, then and now. Isn't that right?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: No, I feel like my mind is blooming wider than ever.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I've always wished to be a bud, soon to burst into bloom.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Shrouded in scent all over the body...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Even if this is my own heart-wrenching path, understood by no one...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I'll still leave behind a morrow, strong and fertile like fallen petals.
